original_text: And he said unto them, This is that which the Lord hath said, To morrow is the rest of the holy sabbath unto the Lord: bake that which ye will bake to day, and seethe that ye will seethe; and that which remaineth over lay up for you to be kept until the morning.
korean_text: 모세가 그들에게 이르되 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 내일은 휴일이니 여호와께 거룩한 안식일이라 너희가 구울 것은 굽고 삶을 것은 삶고 그 나머지는 다 너희를 위하여 아침까지 간수하라

sentences.original_text: This is that which the Lord hath said
To morrow is the rest of the holy sabbath unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 내일은 주께 unto 거룩한 안식일의 안식이라

sentences.original_text: bake that which ye will bake to day
and seethe that ye will seethe
and that which remaineth over lay up for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 남는 것은 너희를 위해 쌓아두라

sentences.original_text: to be kept until the morning
